title: Exki - rue Danielle Casanova
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual atmosphere health food concept international chain. Choose from selection of sandwiches, salads, hot and cold dishes, soup bar, and then pay at the check out. Uses some organic produce and fruit and veg. Vegetarian items labeled including indications if there's dairy or wheat.
